grub_geyser_1.label: Grub Geyser; DISADK; DMGO: 1d6 piercing; disadvantage to spell checks

description.p: You breathe a stream of flesheating maggots at a close target. Target must make a CON vs. your spellcasting check check or take 1d6 piercing damage and suffer DISADV on attacks and spellcasting checks as long as they are covered in maggots.
Target continues to take 1d6 piercing damage each round until the effect ends or until they take an action to brush them off.
